maxPublishedAppsPerService.description: The maximum number of apps per collection

maxUsersPerService.description: The maximum number of users per collection

isDesktopEnabled.description: Whether or not desktops are enabled on this account

rdWebUrl.description: The URL users can go to to access available apps

privacyUrl.description: admin defined URL to the privacy statement

location.description: The home region for the account

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

GetRemoteAppAccount.description: The response for the get account operation.

minimumBilledUserCount.description: Minimum number of user to bill.

RemoteAppBillingPlan.description: Contains details of a billing plan.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

BillingPlanWrapper.description: The response for the get locations operation.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

EnabledFeaturesWrapper.description: The response for the get locations operation.

displayName.description: The display name of the location

Location.description: The location a resource can be in.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

LocationWrapper.description: The response for the get locations operation.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

UpdateRemoteAppAccount.description: The response for the get account operation.

DomainName.description: The name of the on-premise domain to join the RD Session Host servers to.

OrganizationalUnit.description: The name of your organizational unit to join the RD Session Host servers, e.g. OU=MyOu,DC=MyDomain,DC=ParentDomain,DC=com. Attributes such as OU, DC, etc. must be in uppercase.

ServiceAccountUserName.description: The user name of a service account that has permission to add computers to the domain.The username must be specified in the UPN or down-level logon name format (user@some.domain or some.domain\user).

ActiveDirectoryConfig.description: Details of a RemoteApp active directory configuration.

virtualPath.description: The application image path on the destination machine specified with environment variables for the drive and known system path.

alias.description: A short unique name for the application.

availableToUsers.description: A flag to denote if the application will be available to the end user.

commandLineArguments.description: The command line arguments to launch the application.

iconUri.description: The URI for the application's default icon PNG file.

iconPngUris.description: The available map of icon PNG file URIs for different resolutions (e.g. 16x16, 32x32, 64x64). The key of the map is the first dimension of the PNG resolution.

DetailsList.description: List of publishing details for remote applications.

ApplicationDetailsList.description: List of application details used to create or update a collection.

aadObjectId.description: For OrgId principals, the principal's Azure ActiveDirectory object ID

templateImageName.description: The name of the template image for the collection

vnetName.description: The name of the Vnet for the collection

virtualNetworkId.description: The ID of the Vnet for the collection

billingPlanName.description: The plan name associated with this collection.

customRdpProperty.description: Optional customer defined RDP properties of the collection.

readyForPublishing.description: A flag denoting if this collection is ready for publishing operations.

waitBeforeShutdownInMinutes.description: The amount of time to wait, in minutes, before forcing logoff.

region.description: The home region for the account

publishedApplications.description: A list of details of the published applications

allowedPrincipals.description: A list of allowed security principals

subnetName.description: The subnet name of the customer created Azure VNet.

notDomainJoined.description: True if the collection is domain joined, false otherwise

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group the collection is in

CollectionCreationDetails.description: The details for creating a collection.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

CollectionCreationDetailsWrapper.description: Details of collection creation operation results.

includedUsage.description: The number of hours used which are included in the billing plan's base rate.

overageUsage.description: The number of hours used beyond the billing plan's included usage, but not exceeding the billing plan's maximum cost.

waivedUsage.description: The number of hours used beyond the billing plan's maximum cost.  These usage hours are not billed.

totalUsage.description: The total usage hours by the user.

goldImageName.description: The name of the gold image associated with this collection.

lastErrorCode.description: The last operation error code on this collection.

vnetName.description: The VNet name associated with this collection.

adInfo.description: The domain join details for this collection.

planName.description: The plan name associated with this collection.

customRdpProperty.description: Optional customer defined RDP properties of the collection.

readyForPublishing.description: A flag denoting if this collection is ready for publishing operations.

lastModifiedTimeUtc.description: UTC Date time of the last modification of this collection.

maxSessions.description: The maximum number of concurrent users allowed for this collection.

sessionWarningThreshold.description: The end-user session limit warning threshold.  Reaching or crossing this threshold will cause a capacity warning message to be shown in the management portal.

officeType.description: If the template image for this collection includes Office this will specify the type.

trialOnly.description: Trial-only collections can be used only during the trial period of your subscription. When the trial expires or you activate your subscription, these collections will be permanently disabled.

subnetName.description: The subnet name of the customer created Azure VNet.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

Collection.description: The response for the get collection operation.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

commandLineArguments.description: The command line arguments to launch the application.

iconPngUris.description: The available map of icon PNG file URIs for different resolutions (e.g. 16x16, 32x32, 64x64). The key of the map is the first dimension of the PNG resolution.

iconUri.description: The default URI to the application icon png file.

virtualPath.description: The application image path on the destination machine specified with environment variables for the drive and known system path.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

StartMenuApplication.description: Definition containing details of Start Menu Applications.

applicationVirtualPath.description: The application virtual path with respect to local machine.

errorMessage.description: Error message with respect to operation result.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

PublishingOperationResult.description: Details of publishing / unpublishing operation results.

aliases.description: List of applications aliases (short unique names).

AliasesListParameter.description: Parameter definition for AliasesList, used by remote app unpublishing operations.

SecurityPrincipalInfoProperties.description: Contains a security principal and that principal's consent status for this collection.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

SecurityPrincipalInfo.description: Contains details about the security principal and that principal's consent status for this collection.

userConsentStatuses.description: The list of users and their consent status for this collection.

Reserved.description: Pass in an empty string the first tinme this call is made. Afterwards pass in the continuation token returned by the previous call. The stopping condition is when the previous token is null.

SecurityPrincipalInfoListResult.description: The list of principals and their consent statuses.

logonTimeUtc.description: The UTC time the session started

userUpn.description: The Upn of the currently active user

state.description: The session state. Possible values are 'Active', 'Disconnected', 'NoSession', 'Unknown'

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

SessionWrapper.description: The wrapper for the session object

message.description: Message to send to the specified user.

error.description: The security principal operation result error code, if any.

errorDetails.description: Additional details about the error code, if available.

SecurityPrincipalErrorDetails.description: The security principal which failed this operation and the error.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

SecurityPrincipalOperationErrorDetails.description: Operational results of adding or removing a security principal.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
